An #yUnplayable card that is unfinished. May be converted into a playable card by #yRight #yClicking and then choosing an appropriate amount of cards in your hand to #yExhaust.
The Primary of a card is the card's main non-damage and non-Block related attribute or effect.

Orb: Assembles random #yBoosters. When #yEvoked, adds a random #yBooster your hand.
Orb: Deals damage when attacked. When #yEvoked, ALL enemies lose HP.
Orb: Draws a card when you gain [E] . When #yEvoked, gains [E] . NL Reactive is unaffected by #yFocus.
Orb: Deals damage when you deal damage. When #yEvoked, deals damage to a random enemy equal to accumulative damage dealt.
Orb: Gains #yStrength. When #yEvoked, doubles #yStrength and removes an Orb Slot. NL Ritualist is unaffected by #yFocus.
Orb: Reduces damage taken. When #yEvoked, grants #yMetallicize and removes an Orb Slot. NL Tungsten is unaffected by #yFocus.
Orb: Applies #yPoison. When #yEvoked, grants #yEnvenom and removes an Orb Slot. NL Toxic is unaffected by #yFocus.
Orb: Increases #yDexterity. When #yEvoked, grants #yMakeshift #yArmor.
Orb: Decreases damage every turn. When #yEvoked, deals damage to ALL enemies.
